alert.note: Alert for Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones, central Craven and northeastern Onslow Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Rhems, or 14 miles west of New Bern, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Trent Woods, River Bend, Jasper, Tuscarora, Rhems, Pollocksville and Trenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
